alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Delaware; Logan; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 6:28PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN CHAMPAIGN AND SOUTHEASTERN LOGAN COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO, DELAWARE AND UNION COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 715 PM EDT... At 627 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Richwood to near North Lewisburg, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Dublin, Westerville, Delaware, Marysville, Powell, Sunbury, Richwood, North Lewisburg, Ashley, Polaris, New California, Radnor, Milford Center, Shawnee Hills, Galena, Ostrander, Woodstock, Magnetic Springs, Alum Creek State Park and Raymond. This includes I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 122 and 138. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
